Version 3.1.2 UNSTABLE - Re-enabled Dwarves now that beards could be properly tested. - Adjusted races to use StyleSettings instead of HairSettings to be in line with HAR changes.
For More information please see the Outpost 21 Wiki, left-click to open the page, right click to dismiss update.

Version 3.1.0 UNSTABLE - Added Chitine, Firbolg and Halfling races - Fixed Illithid conversion failing - Changed spawn weights of all races in vanilla factions to better represent what would show up where -- All races can still show up in all factions, just at different rates now - Disabled Achievements integration, to be reworked later
Known Issue: The new visual hediffs for eyes are not always correctly placed, this'll be fixed in time.
Dwarves are still disabled currently till HAR is able to handle beards.
For More information please see the Outpost 21 Wiki, left-click to open the page, right click to dismiss update.

Version 3.0.0 UNSTABLE This update is considered unstable due to 1.3 currently also being an unstable build, things may change and saves are not expected to be safe till 1.3 is on the Stable branch of the game and the frameworks this does/will rely on are also stable.
- Updated mod to support RimWorld 1.3. - Faction options for individual races have been removed, you can access all the races through the vanilla factions. More specific and refined factions will be created in time. - Illithid race has been retextured. - The 4 Elf subraces are now under a single setting in the options. - Dwarves are temporarily disabled until I can set the race to have beard tags by default, since beards are vanilla now there's no need for me to use bodyAddons to handle it.
For More information please see the Outpost 21 Wiki, left-click to open the page, right click to dismiss update.
